WorkflowDefinition.description:
API Response Types

Defines the response types for all API endpoints.
These types are used by TSOA to generate OpenAPI schemas.

Record_string.any_.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

PhaseExecution.description: Workflow phase execution with progress tracking

OperationStep.description: Operation step for detailed progress tracking

info.title: AInTandem Orchestrator API
info.description: API for the orchestrator that manages workflows, tasks, containers, and context in the AInTandem platform

get.description: List all organizations

post.description: Create a new organization

get.description: Get a specific organization
List workspaces in an organization

post.description: Create a new workspace

get.description: List all workspaces (across all organizations)
Get a specific workspace
List projects in a workspace

post.description: Create a new project

get.description: List all projects (across all workspaces)
Get a specific project

parameters.description: - Whether to delete the project folder (default: false)
parameters.name: deleteFolder

post.description: Move a project to another workspace

get.description: Get workflow state for a project

put.description: Update workflow state for a project

get.description: List all workflows with optional status filter

post.description: Create new workflow (starts as Draft)

get.description: Get specific workflow by ID

put.description:
Update workflow
If workflow is Published, creates a new version automatically

delete.description:
Delete workflow
Cannot delete templates or workflows in use by projects

patch.description: Change workflow status (Publish, Archive, back to Draft)

post.description: Clone workflow for customization

get.description: List all versions for a workflow
Get specific workflow version by ID

post.description: Create a new workflow execution
Start a workflow execution

get.description: Get workflow execution status
Get workflow executions for a project

post.description: Pause a running workflow execution
Resume a paused workflow execution
Cancel a workflow execution
Execute a new task in the project's sandbox

get.description: Get task history for a project with optional filters

post.description: Execute an ad-hoc task (single-use task)

get.description: Get specific task details

post.description: Set task limit for project's sandbox

get.description: Get queue status for project's sandbox

post.description: Cancel a queued task
Execute a workflow step as a task

get.description: Get context information for a specific task

post.description: Manually save task output as a context memory
Get relevant context for a task prompt (used by frontend for suggestions)

get.description: Get user settings
List all Docker sandboxes managed by the orchestrator

post.description: Create a new Docker sandbox for a project

get.description: List all available sandbox images

post.description: Start a Docker sandbox by ID
Stop a Docker sandbox by ID

delete.description: Delete a Docker sandbox by ID

post.description: Start a Docker sandbox asynchronously with progress tracking
Stop a Docker sandbox asynchronously with progress tracking
Restart a Docker sandbox asynchronously with progress tracking

delete.description: Delete a Docker sandbox asynchronously with progress tracking

get.description: Get the status of an asynchronous sandbox operation

post.description: Cancel an asynchronous sandbox operation

get.description: Get operations for a specific project

post.description: Browse host directories (legacy)

get.description: List folders at BASE_ROOT level (for organizations)
List folders within an organization (for workspaces)
List folders within a workspace (for projects)
Health check endpoint for the API server

post.description: Create a new memory

get.description: Get all memories with optional filters

put.description:
Create or update memory by unique identifier
This endpoint prevents duplicate memories from external sources like CoSpec AI

get.description: Get a specific memory by ID

post.description: Semantic search for memories

200.description: List of memories for the scope

get.description: Get memories for a specific scope with optional hierarchical inheritance
Get similar memories (semantic search based on memory content)
Get overall memory statistics
Get memory statistics for a specific scope
Health check for the context system
Get context system information

post.description: Import a document file to the context system
Import document content directly (no filesystem access needed)
Import all documents from a folder
Sync a single file (re-import if changed)
Sync all files in a folder

get.description: Get file sync statistics
Get list of tracked files

post.description: Auto-capture task dialog to context
Trigger full hierarchy resync to context-manager
Authenticate user credentials and return JWT tokens
Invalidate the refresh token

Refresh the access token using the refresh token
The refresh token can be provided in the request body or in a cookie

get.description:
Verify the validity of the current access token (from Authorization header)
Use this to check if the current user is authenticated

post.description:
Verify the validity of an access token (provided in request body)
Use this for backend-to-backend token validation
